item.title: Infused design with Jared Spool - UX Podcast
item.description: We can identify business value by asking the following questions about the end results of our project: Will it increase revenue? Will it decrease expenses? Will it bring in new customers? Will it bring in more money from existing customers? Will it increase shareholder/taxpayer value? –> About business value
